signer.description: signer defines the x/gov module account address or other authority signing the message

denom.description: Denom for the rate limit, as it appears on the rate limited chain When rate limiting a non-native token, this will be an ibc denom

channelOrClientId.description: ChannelId for the rate limit, on the side of the rate limited chain

maxPercentSend.description: MaxPercentSend defines the threshold for outflows The threshold is defined as a percentage (e.g. 10 indicates 10%)

maxPercentRecv.description: MaxPercentSend defines the threshold for inflows The threshold is defined as a percentage (e.g. 10 indicates 10%)

durationHours.description: DurationHours specifies the number of hours before the rate limit is reset (e.g. 24 indicates that the rate limit is reset each day)

MsgAddRateLimit.title: Msg Add Rate Limit
MsgAddRateLimit.description: Gov tx to add a new rate limit
